setup-worktree-unix: npm ci || pnpm install || yarn install

if [ ! -f agents/COORDINATION_BOARD.md ]; then cp $ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/.cursor/worktrees-examples/COORDINATION_BOARD.md agents/COORDINATION_BOARD.md 2>/dev/null || echo '# Coordination Board

## Goals

## Changes

## Next Owner

## Status
' > agents/COORDINATION_BOARD.md; fi
npm run build || pnpm build || yarn build || true
setup-worktree-windows: npm ci || pnpm install || yarn install
if not exist agents mkdir agents

if not exist agents\COORDINATION_BOARD.md (copy %ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\.cursor\worktrees-examples\COORDINATION_BOARD.md agents\COORDINATION_BOARD.md 2>nul || echo # Coordination Board > agents\COORDINATION_BOARD.md)
npm run build || pnpm build || yarn build || echo.
setup-worktree: echo 'Orchestrator worktree setup - install dependencies, create coordination board structure'
